roles.title: Middleweight Developer
roles.description: Tasked with individual projects taking them from inception to delivery along with collaborative projects with the wider team. New opportunities for mentoring as we expanded with code reviews and pair programming. Mainly with working Nuxt.js & headless CraftCMS via GraphQL

roles.title: Junior Developer
roles.description: Continuing personal development as a junior across all aspects of web development. Working alongside the dev team adding functionality to existing clients, mainly working with VueJS & CraftCMS.

roles.title: Junior Developer
roles.description: Initial first few months focusing on personal development and tooling research, along with onboarding for the agencies processes. Then to support the Development team and the wider company on client & in-house projects.

roles.title: Digital Designer
roles.description:
Contributed to the digital marketing plan by providing creative solutions for various challenges and goals. My main tasks included the design and development of email campaigns for both business and consumer audiences. I collaborated with a team of professionals to manage multiple brands and adapt to different needs.

A standout project was the creation of the Edge bike range consumer website for Lapierre in line with the product launch. Establishing the build stack, hosting, then wireframing and prototyping. Before producing or sourcing the required assets and lastly developing, testing and the shipping of the finished site all to a time critical deadline.

roles.title: Graphic Designer
roles.description:
I was part of a team responsible for helping Raleigh UK achieve its marketing goals for various brands. One of my main tasks was the Raleigh catalogue, which showcased more than 10,000 products.

I contributed to the creation and presentation of packaging lines, bicycle models and point-of-sale displays in stores. The Centros, the leading e-bike launched in 2018, featured my design concept.

roles.title: Graphic Designer
roles.description:
This role required me to work closely with various clients from start to finish on different projects. I communicated effectively with multiple suppliers and delivered high-quality results on time and within budget.

I faced many challenges in this role as a fresh graduate, but I learned a lot and gained confidence in my skills and abilities.
